verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> be the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H5002>said,<s%> <S%H1732><s%> and the <S%H1397>man<s%> who was raised <S%H6965>up<s%> on <S%H5920>high,<s%> the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and the <S%H5273>sweet<s%> <S%H2158>psalmist<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>said,<s%>
The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by me, and his <S%H4405>word<s%> was <S%H5921>in<s%> my <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, He that ruleth <S%H4910>over<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> must be <S%H6662>just,<s%> <S%H4910>ruling<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And he shall be as the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>riseth,<s%> even a <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5645>clouds;<s%> as the tender <S%H1877>grass<s%> springing out of the <S%H4480>earth<s%> <S%H776><s%> by clear <S%H4480>shining<s%> <S%H5051><s%> after <S%H4480>rain.<s%> <S%H4306><s%>

Although <S%H3588><s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> <S%H3588>yet<s%> he hath <S%H7760>made<s%> with me an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H6186>ordered<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> things, and <S%H8104>sure:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> this is <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2656>desire,<s%> <S%H3588>although<s%> he make it <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H6779>grow.<s%>

But the sons of <S%H1100>Belial<s%> shall be <S%H3605>all<s%> of them as <S%H6975>thorns<s%> thrust <S%H5074>away,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> with hands: <S%H3027><s%>

But the <S%H376>man<s%> that shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> them must be <S%H4390>fenced<s%> with <S%H1270>iron<s%> and the <S%H6086>staff<s%> of a <S%H2595>spear;<s%> and they shall be utterly <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H8313><s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> in the same <S%H7675>place.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> be the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had: The <S%H8461>Tachmonite<s%> that <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H7675>seat,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> among the <S%H7991>captains;<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> was <S%H5722>Adino<s%> the <S%H6112>Eznite:<s%> he lifted up his spear <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> whom he <S%H2491>slew<s%> at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> the <S%H1121>Ahohite,<s%> <S%H266><s%> one of the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> when they <S%H2778>defied<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that were <S%H8033>there<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gone away: <S%H5927><s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3588><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3021>weary,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1692>cleaved<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H389>only<s%> to <S%H6584>spoil.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H89>Agee<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite.<s%> And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> into a <S%H2416>troop,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H2513>piece<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5742>lentils:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

But he <S%H3320>stood<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2513>ground,<s%> and <S%H5337>defended<s%> it, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory.<s%>

And <S%H7969>three<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> went <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the harvest <S%H7105>time<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H5725>Adullam:<s%> and the <S%H2416>troop<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in a <S%H4686>hold,<s%> and the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H183>longed,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Oh that <S%H4310>one<s%> would give me <S%H8248>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H4480>well<s%> <S%H953><s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H8179>gate!<s%>

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> broke <S%H1234>through<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H4480>well<s%> <S%H953><s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was by the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> it, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David:<s%> nevertheless he <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> thereof, but poured it <S%H5258>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Be it <S%H2486>far<s%> from me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I should <S%H4480>do<s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H2063>this:<s%> is not this the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> in jeopardy of their <S%H5315>lives?<s%> therefore he <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> it. <S%H428>These<s%> things <S%H6213>did<s%> these <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>

And <S%H52>Abishai,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> was <S%H7218>chief<s%> among <S%H7992>three.<s%> And <S%H1931>he<s%> lifted <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and <S%H2491>slew<s%> them, and had the <S%H8034>name<s%> among <S%H7969>three.<s%>

Was he <S%H3588>not<s%> <S%H4480>most<s%> <S%H3513>honorable<s%> of <S%H7969>three?<s%> therefore he <S%H1961>was<s%> their <S%H8269>captain:<s%> howbeit he <S%H935>attained<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the first <S%H7969>three.<s%>

And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> of <S%H4480>Kabzeel,<s%> <S%H6909><s%> who had done many <S%H7227>acts,<s%> <S%H6467><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> lionlike <S%H739>men<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> also and <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H8432>pit<s%> <S%H953><s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> of snow: <S%H7950><s%>

And <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> an <S%H376>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H4713><s%> a <S%H4758>goodly<s%> <S%H376>man:<s%> and the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> had a <S%H2595>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but he went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him with a <S%H7626>staff,<s%> and <S%H1497>plucked<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> out of the Egyptian's <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H4713><s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> him with his own <S%H2595>spear.<s%>
These <S%H428><s%> things <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> and had the <S%H8034>name<s%> among <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>

He was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> but he <S%H935>attained<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the first <S%H7969>three.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him <S%H413>over<s%> his <S%H4928>guard.<s%>
Asahel <S%H6214><s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> was one of the <S%H7970>thirty;<s%> <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%>
Shammah <S%H8048><s%> the <S%H2733>Harodite,<s%> <S%H470>Elika<s%> the <S%H2733>Harodite,<s%>
Helez <S%H2503><s%> the <S%H6407>Paltite,<s%> <S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite,<s%>
Abiezer <S%H44><s%> the <S%H6069>Anethothite,<s%> <S%H4012>Mebunnai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite,<s%>
Zalmon <S%H6756><s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%> <S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%>

Heleb <S%H2460><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1196>Baanah,<s%> a <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> <S%H863>Ittai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7380>Ribai<s%> out of <S%H4480>Gibeah<s%> <S%H1390><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%>
Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite,<s%> <S%H1914>Hiddai<s%> of the <S%H4480>brooks<s%> <S%H5158><s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash,<s%>
Abi-albon <S%H45><s%> the <S%H6164>Arbathite,<s%> <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H1273>Barhumite,<s%>
Eliahba <S%H455><s%> the <S%H8170>Shaalbonite,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3464>Jashen,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%>
Shammah <S%H8048><s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%> <S%H279>Ahiam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8325>Sharar<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%>

Eliphelet <S%H467><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H308>Ahasbai,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4602>Maachathite,<s%> <S%H463>Eliam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> the <S%H1526>Gilonite,<s%>
Hezrai <S%H2695><s%> the <S%H3761>Carmelite,<s%> <S%H6474>Paarai<s%> the <S%H701>Arbite,<s%>
Igal <S%H3008><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> of <S%H4480>Zobah,<s%> <S%H6678><s%> <S%H1137>Bani<s%> the <S%H1425>Gadite,<s%>

Zelek <S%H6768><s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite,<s%> <S%H5171>Naharai<s%> the <S%H886>Beerothite,<s%> <S%H3627>armorbearer<s%> <S%H5375><s%> to <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%>
Ira <S%H5896><s%> an <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%> <S%H1619>Gareb<s%> an <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%>
Uriah <S%H223><s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite:<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> in <S%H3605>all.<s%>
